import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Star, Bell, MessageCircle, Heart } from 'lucide-react'; import './Home.css'; import ChatBox from './ChatBox'; const featuredListings = [ { id: 1, title: "Cozy Studio in Thamel", price: 25000, furnished: true, amenities: { parking: true, wifi: true, water: true }, image: "/room1.jpg", landlordName: "John Doe" }, { id: 2, title: "Spacious Apartment in Patan", price: 35000, furnished: false, amenities: { parking: true, wifi: true, water: false }, image: "/room2.jpeg", landlordName: "Jane Smith" }, { id: 3, title: "Modern Loft in Lazimpat", price: 30000, furnished: true, amenities: { parking: false, wifi: true, water: true }, image: "/room3.jpeg", landlordName: "Peter Jones" } ]; const testimonials = [ { id: 1, name: "Aarav Sharma", role: "Student", content: "RoomRental made finding a comfortable and affordable room near my university so easy. The landlord communication feature was a game-changer!", rating: 5, }, { id: 2, name: "Priya Thapa", role: "Young Professional", content: "I've used RoomRental twice now, and both experiences have been fantastic. The variety of options and detailed listings helped me find exactly what I was looking for.", rating: 4, }, { id: 3, name: "Bikash Rai", role: "Digital Nomad", content: "As someone who moves frequently for work, RoomRental has been a lifesaver. It's so convenient to find furnished rooms with all the amenities I need.", rating: 5, }, ]; function Home() { const [searchParams, setSearchParams] = useState({ location: '', priceRange: '', furnished: '', amenities: [] }); const [favorites, setFavorites] = useState([]); const [showChat, setShowChat] = useState(false); const [currentLandlord, setCurrentLandlord] = useState(''); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setSearchParams(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Search params:', searchParams); }; const toggleFavorite = (listingId) => { setFavorites(prev => { if (prev.includes(listingId)) { return prev.filter(id => id !== listingId); } else { return [...prev, listingId]; } }); }; return (
